title: Deutsche Bank retains top position in Euromoney Cash Management Survey
body:
In the recent Euromoney Cash Management Survey, Deutsche Bank has retained its top position as “No 1 Best Cash Manager” for Western Europe for the fifth consecutive year. In addition, the Bank won key No 1 positions as best cash management house in Germany, Spain and Belgium. For the first time, the Bank was named number one in Euro cash management in the Nordics & Baltics and in the Australasia regions. Moreover, the bank has retained No 1 positions in Euro for Europe, North America and Africa. Globally the Bank ranks No 3 as International Cash Management Provider of Choice.

“These wins reflect the strength of the Bank’s cash management franchise as well as the loyalty and trust many clients place in the bank”, Michael Spiegel, Global Head of Trade Finance and Cash Management, commented on the awards.

This year’s survey attracted a record number of votes from more than 32,000 corporates and 2,200 financial institutions. Respondents were asked to indicate which three banks they use the most for their cash management services and to rate those banks.
